page.title: 13Workplace of Bradley people.
page.content: In some old papers about Bradley Free Grammar School,the professions of the parents of the children were listed. They all lived and worked in or near Bradley.Children from the school carried out a survey to find out where the people of Bradley work today.These were the questions which were asked:How many people living in your house work? Where do they work-in Bradley parish, in Stafford the nearest town, or further away? What work do they do? It was found that 25% of the people interviewed worked in Bradley, 26% of the people worked in Stafford.Approx. 35% of the people work some distance away.The rest of the people interviewed -about 13% were retired. A hundred years ago most of the working people of Bradley worked in farming.Very few do today. Most are office workers or work in industry.
